amendment.description: To set aside Navy operation and maintenance funds for the Navy Pilot Human Resources Call Center, Cutler, Maine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1226 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1226 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Snowe to Amendment SA 1217. (consideration: CR S9315-9316; text: CR S9316) To set aside Navy operation and maintenance funds for the Navy Pilot Human Resources Call Center, Cutler, Maine.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1226 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1226 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Snowe to Amendment SA 1217.
